comments.en:
Probably japanese equivalent of the Epson Stylus C50.

Cheap 4-ink home printer with a medium resolution (1440x720 dpi), but faster than the Stylus C42 printers and with 4 pl ink drops.

Should work with the Gimp-Print driver for the Epson Stylus C42 printers, but probably with limited quality in the highest resolution.
